articles.title: 'Agnipath' Protests: Trains Set On Fire, Stations Vandalised In Bihar, UP
articles.description: Mob set trains on fire in Uttar Pradesh and Bihar this morning as the protests over the new military recruitment policy, Agnipath, entered the third consecutive day today. The government has defended the scheme, calling it "transformative".
articles.content: <li>Trains were set afire, public and police vehicles attacked in Uttar Pradesh and Bihar for the third consecutive day today amid protests against the new recruitment scheme that has set off a fires… [+2701 chars]

articles.description: The 12,213 new infections in India on June 16 is the highest jump in cases since mid-February. Experts emphasise on taking the booster shot and continuing with safety protocols
